DECIMAL (10, 3)), 0) + IFNULL(CAST(MPI.PRODUCTION_CNT AS DECIMAL (10, 3)), 0) AS PRODUCTION_CNT ,IFNULL(CAST(CTE.SHIP_CNT AS DECIMAL (10, 3)), 0) + IFNULL(CAST(MPI.SHIP_CNT AS DECIMAL (10, 3)), 0) AS SHIP_CNT ,IFNULL(CAST(PROD_STOCK_CNT AS DECIMAL (10, 3)) + IFNULL(CAST(INOUT_CNT AS DECIMAL (10, 3)), 0), 0) PROD_STOCK_CNT FROM CTE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT FACT_CD ,PROD_CD ,IFNULL(SUM(PRODUCTION_CNT), 0) PRODUCTION_CNT ,IFNULL(SUM(SHIP_CNT), 0) SHIP_CNT ,IFNULL(SUM(INOUT_CNT), 0) INOUT_CNT ,DATE_FORMAT(INOUT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') INOUT_DT FROM ( SELECT FACT_CD ,PROD_CD ,IFNULL(SUM(IF(INOUT_TYPE = 'I' AND INOUT_ITEM = '01', INOUT_CNT, 0)), 0) PRODUCTION_CNT -- ,IFNULL(SUM(IF(INOUT_TYPE = 'O' AND INOUT_ITEM = '02', INOUT_CNT, 0)), 0) SHIP_CNT ,0 SHIP_CNT ,SUM(IF( INOUT_ITEM IN ('01', '02'), IF(INOUT_TYPE = 'I', INOUT_CNT * -1, INOUT_CNT) , 0)) INOUT_CNT ,DATE_FORMAT(INOUT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') INOUT_DT FROM MES_PRODUCT_INOUT JOIN MES_PRODUCT_INFO USING(FACT_CD, PROD_CD) WHERE PROD_CLS IN ('P') AND DATE_FORMAT(INOUT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{startDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(INOUT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{endDate} GROUP BY PROD_CD, DATE_FORMAT(INOUT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') UNION ALL SELECT FACT_CD ,PROD_CD ,0 PRODUCTION_CNT ,IFNULL(SUM(SHIP_DETAIL_CNT), 0) SHIP_CNT ,0 INOUT_CNT ,DATE_FORMAT(SHIP_DETAIL_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') INOUT_DT FROM MES_SHIP_DETAIL JOIN MES_SHIP_INFO USING (FACT_CD, ODR_CD, SHIP_CD) JOIN MES_ORDER_INFO USING (FACT_CD, ODR_CD) WHERE DATE_FORMAT(SHIP_DETAIL_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{startDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(SHIP_DETAIL_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{endDate} GROUP BY PROD_CD, DATE_FORMAT(SHIP_DETAIL_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') ) AA GROUP BY PROD_CD, INOUT_DT ) MPI ON DATE_FORMAT(MPI.INOUT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') = CTE.START_DATE AND MPI.PROD_CD = CTE.PROD_CD WHERE START_DATE >= #{startDate} + INTERVAL 0 DAY ) SELECT START_DATE ,PROD_CD ,PROD_PN ,PROD_NM ,PROD_KIND ,(SELECT CODE_NM FROM DFT_CODE_INFO WHERE CODE_ID = 'PROD_KIND' AND CODE_CD = PROD_KIND ) PROD_KIND_NM ,PROD_GROUP ,(SELECT BASE_DETAIL_NM FROM DFT_BASE_DETAIL WHERE BASE_DETAIL_CD = PROD_GROUP ) PROD_GROUP_NM ,PROD_FAMILY ,(SELECT BASE_DETAIL_NM FROM DFT_BASE_DETAIL WHERE BASE_DETAIL_CD = PROD_FAMILY ) PROD_FAMILY_NM ,PROD_STAND ,PROD_UNIT ,(SELECT BASE_DETAIL_NM FROM DFT_BASE_DETAIL WHERE BASE_DETAIL_CD = PROD_UNIT ) PROD_UNIT_NM ,PROD_PRICE ,PROD_MAIN_COMP ,(SELECT COMP_NM FROM MES_COMPANY_INFO WHERE COMP_CD = PROD_MAIN_COMP ) PROD_MAIN_COMP_NM ,PROD_KEEP_CNT ,A.PROD_STOCK_CNT DF_PROD_STOCK_CNT ,PRODUCTION_CNT ,SHIP_CNT ,SF_GET_DATE_JEGO_CNT(PROD_CD, #{endDate}, 0) CUR_PROD_STOCK_CNT ,RANKING FROM ( SELECT PROD_CD) WHERE RANKING = 1 ORDER BY PROD_PN, PROD_NM
